name: garr-shib2sp
author: GARR
summary: A Shibboleth2 puppet module that installs Shibboleth IdP on EL/Debian platforms

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: The name of the new file to be created

parameters.name: url
parameters.doc: The file's URL to be downloaded

parameters.name: extract
parameters.doc: A flag indicating whether the files should be extracted after download or not

parameters.name: execute_command
parameters.doc: An array of commands to be executed after download

properties.name: ensure
properties.doc: Whether the resource is in sync or not.

types.name: download_file
types.doc: A new type of resource that downloads a file from an URL and put it on one on the system, existing or not.
